title: What are few good gyms in Secunderabad? - Quora

response.answer_text: We have seen many gyms from chilkalguda to rtc cross roads.But the best one is muscle power fitness studio. It is located in padmarao nagar. It is for both men and women. It's an Air conditioned gym. Equipment is very good but the space is less. There are three trainers. The cost is 1000 + 200 is the registration fee for the first month. I hope u'll like it.
I think you will love Proquest Fitness located near Gunrock Enclave - I am a member since 2009 and the facilities are great. Trainers are OK. You can call them at 040–2772292. Best of luck!
